title: Hextech Crafting ... Crash no fix
body: So ive tried everything + some i removed every file re downloaded ran the repair tool, And nothing so far. checked logs everything. i even went so far as to redo windows+ updates and even rolled back my updates before that. I like most keep either getting Rads error, or client has stop working. the only thing so far the repair did was stop my client from crashing in the middle of team select that ive noticed. Yes i spend money.. i support the game i like to play. and sadly i wanna get augment chest before they are gone.. so Riot would you please put the foot on the gas and fix this issue im sure others are wanting to do the same but dont wanna risk the fact they cant even open or use the content at this time and point.. if anyone has a work around let us ALL know!! and this issue wasnt just recent.. its been a on going thing for the last two weeks for me.. so its a issue that must and has to be fixed for all players.

replies.body:
Update: Fixed issue at least on my end.

What happened was it was displaying the following error on some occasions of the crash;

"Microsoft Visual C++ Runtime Library

Runtime Error!

Program: C"\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\proj...

This application has requested the Runtime to terminate in an unusual way. 
Please contact the application's support team for more information."

So 1 by 1 I started closing other programs open til it stopped crashing. 

The program that was causing the issue was AMD Raptr (AMD Gaming Evolved)

Try this and see if it works.
This was exactly the issue, Thank you so much!

I am getting this issue as well. If I reboot my machine, log in, click on it then it works. If I leave it or play a match and come back it crashes, even if I restart the client the issue persists. I do not use any third party applications and if needed I can submit logs/screenshots, hell I'll let you remote in if you want. The PC is rather new maybe a month old.

We're currently looking into this issue where some players are crashing when opening hextech crafting.  Are you currently running any third party apps for League like Overwolf, or anything like that?  If so, disable them and let me know what you come up with!

idk about the OP, but my client crashes every time I go to the hextech crafting, but only if/after I've just played a match. 

I am not running any 3rd party league programs, and it happens whether I have curse client open or closed (only other thing I ever have open when playing league).
